review: We bought a Fire TV box (that we ended up returning), an Apple TV box and an ActionTec streaming device to mirror the content from our phones and tablets to our TV. Then we got the Roku stick. We didn't NEED any of the others! The Roku stick does all of what we wanted, and does it better, for half the price of ONE of those other devices! It also allows us to tie our devices so that we can mirror them (at least we can with our Android devices) to our TV.
author: Amazon Customer
